title.rendered: “IDF Fighter Jets Launch Strategic Strike on Hezbollah Military Facilities: A Detailed Report”

content.rendered:
IDF Spokesperson:

The IDF attacked a military facility of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in a wide area

A short while ago, IDF fighter jets attacked a military building of the Hezbollah terrorist organization in a broad area.

In addition, the organization’s military infrastructure in the village area of Bnei Hiaan was attacked overnight by fighter jets.

Moreover, a launch from Lebanese territory towards the Mount Dov area was identified a short time ago, which fell in an open area, and another launch towards the Situla area.
The IDF attacked the shooting sources with artillery.

Attached is documentation of the attacks: https://bit.ly/4bx7FPt
